title: "Nvidia TAO Toolkit update aims to simplify deep learning model development"
excerpt: "Nvidia Corp. is aiming to make life easier for developers of artificial intelligence applications with an update to its TAO Toolkit platform. TAO Toolkit is a low-code version of Nvidia’s Train, Adapt and Optimize framework that’s designed to simplify and accelerate AI model creation for enterprise applications."
